article_title: GE Saves $3.3 Billion With Cuts to Retirees' Life, Health Benefits
article_text: You need to LOG IN to edit your watchlist.

article_metadata.description: General Electric (GE) booked $3.3 billion in savings last quarter by widening retiree-benefit cuts from salaried positions to hourly production jobs, prompting a backlash from former employees.
article_metadata.author: James Passeri
